sentences.en: a leaflet on local places of interest
sentences.cn: 有关当地名胜的小册子

sentences.en: Campaigners handed out leaflets on passive smoking.
sentences.cn: 发起人分发了关于被动吸烟的传单。

sentences.en: Compile and translate technical application materials, like leaflet , brochures etc.
sentences.cn: 编写翻译产品技术施用资料, 简介, 手册等.

sentences.en: Full - board rate is shown on the back of the leaflet.
sentences.cn: 宣传小册子的背后附有全食宿价格.

sentences.en: He picked up a leaflet about care of the teeth.
sentences.cn: 他拾起一张宣传保护牙齿的传单.
他在向街区居民散发传单。

sentences.en: I pick up a leaflet about the care of teeth.
sentences.cn: 我拿起一张宣传保护牙齿的传单.

sentences.en: Judy reached into her handbag and handed me a small printed leaflet.
sentences.cn: 朱蒂把手伸进提包，拿出一张小的印刷传单给我。

sentences.en: PS. Please show your friends this letter and the enclosed leaflet.
sentences.cn: 附：请把这封信和内装的小册子给你的朋友们看看。

sentences.en: She asks him to try his hand at preparing a draft for an advertising leaflet.
sentences.cn: 她叫他试着草拟一份广告.

sentences.en: Students were handing out election leaflets at the station.
sentences.cn: 学生在车站分发选举传单。

sentences.en: The leaflet explains how to complain to the banking ombudsman.
sentences.cn: 这份传单介绍了如何向银行意见调查官投诉。

sentences.en: The leaflet is available free of charge from post offices.
sentences.cn: 宣传单可以到邮局免费领取。

sentences.en: The leaflet is in PDF format.
They sew around the leaflet , on tile new film.
sentences.cn: 他们散发新电影的传单.

sentences.en: This leaflet contains your operating instructions.
sentences.cn: 这份单页材料印有你应知道的操作说明.

sentences.en: We were paid to leaflet the mall with advertisements.
sentences.cn: 有人雇佣我们在购物中心发放广告传单.

sentences.en: We'll produce the leaflet in large and small formats.
sentences.cn: 我们将把传单印成大小两种样式.

trans.tran_cn: 散页印刷品，传单，小册子
trans.tran_en: a small book or piece of paper advertising something or giving information on a particular subject
